foreign_names.name: Revif
foreign_names.text: Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière une carte de créature ciblée avec un coût converti de mana inférieur ou égal à 3.

foreign_names.name: Ridestare
foreign_names.text: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura bersaglio con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 3 dal tuo cimitero.

foreign_names.name: 回生
foreign_names.text: あなたの墓地から点数で見たマナ・コストが３以下のクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それを戦場に戻す。

foreign_names.name: 부활
foreign_names.text: 당신의 무덤에 있는 전환마나비용이 3 이하인 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreign_names.name: Revitalização
foreign_names.text: Devolva o card de criatura alvo com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 3 de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha.

foreign_names.name: Возрождение
foreign_names.text: Верните целевую карту существа с конвертированной мана-стоимостью не более 3 из вашего кладбища на поле битвы.

foreign_names.name: 再生
foreign_names.text: 将目标总法术力费用等于或小于3的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

foreign_names.name: 再生
foreign_names.text: 將目標總魔法力費用等於或小於3的生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場。

name: Revival
original_text: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: If a card in a graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

To double a player’s life total, that player gains as much life as needed so that their life total is twice the number it was before. If their life total was negative, that player loses as much life as needed so that their life total is twice as far below 0 as it was before. Other effects interact with this life gain or loss accordingly.

text: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

flavor: Serra's blessing lies strongest upon Sursi, where her holy chapels are untouched even as the Cabal encroaches.

foreign_names.flavor: Serras Segen wirkt am stärksten in Sursi, wo ihre heiligen Kapellen unberührt stehen, trotz des Vormarsches der Kabbalisten.
foreign_names.name: Isolierte Kapelle
foreign_names.text:
Die Isolierte Kapelle kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst eine Ebene oder einen Sumpf.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {B}.

foreign_names.flavor: La bendición de Serra es más intensa en Sursi, cuyas capillas sagradas permanecen intactas a pesar de las invasiones de la Cábala.
foreign_names.name: Capilla aislada
foreign_names.text:
La Capilla aislada entra al campo de batalla girada a menos que controles una Llanura o un Pantano.
{T}: Agrega {W} o {B}.

foreign_names.flavor: La bénédiction de Serra est particulièrement puissante à Sursi, où ses saintes chapelles restent intactes malgré l'approche de la Coterie.
foreign_names.name: Chapelle isolée
foreign_names.text:
La Chapelle isolée arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez une plaine ou un marais.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {B}.

foreign_names.flavor: È a Sursi che la benedizione di Serra perdura più potente: qui le sue cappelle sacre sono rimaste intatte nonostante l'invasione della Cabala.
foreign_names.name: Cappella Isolata
foreign_names.text:
La Cappella Isolata entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli una Pianura o una Palude.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o {B}.

foreign_names.flavor: セラの祝福は最も強くサーシに注ぐ。その地にはセラの聖教会があるが、侵入してくる陰謀団も手が出せない。
foreign_names.name: 孤立した礼拝堂
foreign_names.text:
孤立した礼拝堂は、あなたが平地か沼をコントロールしていないかぎり、タップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{W}か{B}を加える。

foreign_names.flavor: 세라의 축복은 수르시를 굳건하게 지키며, 그녀의 성스러운 예배실은 도당의 침략 때도 피해를 입지 않았다.
foreign_names.name: 외딴 예배당
foreign_names.text:
외딴 예배당은 당신이 들이나 늪을 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {W} 또는 {B}를 추가한다.

foreign_names.flavor: A bênção de Serra é mais forte em Sursi, onde suas capelas sagradas permanecem intocadas mesmo com o avanço da Cabala.
foreign_names.name: Capela Isolada
foreign_names.text:
Capela Isolada entra no campo de batalha virada, a menos que você controle uma Planície ou um Pântano.
{T}: Adicione {W} ou {B}.

foreign_names.flavor: Благословение Серры сильнее всего пало на Сурси — здесь ее священные часовни остаются нетронутыми, даже когда наступают кабалы.
foreign_names.name: Уединенная Часовня
foreign_names.text:
Уединенная Часовня выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если под вашим контролем нет Равнины или Болота.
{T}: добавьте {W} или {B}.

foreign_names.flavor: 撒拉的祝福在苏西最为强大，就连在柯帮侵袭时，其神圣礼拜堂仍能屹立不摇。
foreign_names.name: 孤立礼拜堂
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控平原或沼泽，否则孤立礼拜堂须横置进战场。
{T}：加{W}或{B}。

foreign_names.flavor: 撒拉的祝福在蘇西最為強大，就連在柯幫侵襲時，其神聖禮拜堂仍能屹立不搖。
foreign_names.name: 孤立禮拜堂
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控平原或沼澤，否則孤立禮拜堂須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{W}或{B}。

name: Isolated Chapel
original_text:
Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
text:
Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

flavor: Sin is debt, and absolution is paid in tithes of gold and blood.

foreign_names.flavor: Sünden sind Schulden, und Vergebung wird mit Gold und Blut erkauft.
foreign_names.name: Gottloser Schrein
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {B}.)
Sowie der Gottlose Schrein ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt er getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor: El pecado es una deuda, y la absolución se paga en diezmos de oro y sangre.
foreign_names.name: Altar sin dios
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Agrega {W} o {B}.)
En cuanto el Altar sin dios entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girado.

foreign_names.flavor: La dette est un péché, et l'absolution se paye en dîme d'or et de sang.
foreign_names.name: Reliquaire impie
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {B}.)
Au moment où le Reliquaire impie arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, il arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.

foreign_names.flavor: Ogni peccato è un debito e l'assoluzione si paga con tributi d'oro e di sangue.
foreign_names.name: Santuario Senza Dio
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {W} o {B}.)
Mentre il Santuario Senza Dio entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.

foreign_names.flavor: 罪は債務だ。赦しは金と血の徴税で支払われる。
foreign_names.name: 神無き祭殿
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{W}か{B}を加える。）
神無き祭殿が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor: 죄는 빚이며, 면죄부는 금과 피로 사야 한다.
foreign_names.name: 신이 떠난 신전
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {W} 또는 {B}를 추가한다.)
신이 떠난 신전이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 신이 떠난 신전은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor: O pecado é uma dívida, e a absolvição é paga em dízimos de sangue e ouro.
foreign_names.name: Sacrário Ateísta
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Adicione {W} ou {B}.
Conforme Sacrário Ateísta entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ele entrará no campo de batalha virado.

foreign_names.flavor: Грех — это долг, и за отпущение греха ты платишь десятину золотом и кровью.
foreign_names.name: Нечестивый Алтарь
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {W} или {B}.)
При выходе Нечестивого Алтаря на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, он выходит на поле битвы повернутым.

foreign_names.flavor: 恶行即为债务，需上缴黄金与鲜血来谋求宽恕。
foreign_names.name: 无神祭祠
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{W}或{B}。）
于无神祭祠进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则无神祭祠须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor: 惡行即為債務，需上繳黃金與鮮血來謀求寬恕。
foreign_names.name: 無神祭祠
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{W}或{B}。）
於無神祭祠進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則無神祭祠須橫置進戰場。

name: Godless Shrine
original_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

flavor: Life is a show, and death its final performance.

foreign_names.flavor: Das Leben ist ein Theaterstück, der Tod der letzte Akt.
foreign_names.name: Blutkrypta
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {R}.)
Sowie die Blutkrypta ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt sie getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor: La vida es una actuación, y la muerte es el espectáculo final.
foreign_names.name: Cripta sangrienta
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Agrega {B} o {R}.)
En cuanto la Cripta sangrienta entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girada.

foreign_names.flavor: La vie est un spectacle dont la mort est la dernière représentation.
foreign_names.name: Crypte de sang
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R}.)
Au moment où la Crypte de sang arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, elle arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.

foreign_names.flavor: La vita è uno spettacolo e la morte è l'ultima esibizione.
foreign_names.name: Cripta di Sangue
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R}.)
Mentre la Cripta di Sangue entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.

foreign_names.flavor: 人生はショーだ。そして死はその最後のパフォーマンスだ。

foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{B}か{R}を加える。）
血の墓所が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor: 인생은 연극이고, 죽음은 그 마지막 공연이다.

foreign_names.text:
({T}: {B} 또는 {R}를 추가한다.)

foreign_names.flavor: A vida é um espetáculo, e a morte é sua última performance.

Conforme Cripta de Sangue entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ela entrará no campo de batalha virada.

foreign_names.flavor: Вся жизнь — спектакль, а смерть — заключительный акт.
foreign_names.name: Кровавый Склеп
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {B} или {R}.)
При выходе Кровавого Склепа на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, он выходит на поле битвы повернутым.

foreign_names.flavor: 生命本身就是一场演出，死亡正是其最后一幕。
foreign_names.name: 血腥墓穴
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{B}或{R}。）
于血腥墓穴进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则血腥墓穴须横置进战场。

foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{B}或{R}。）
於血腥墓穴進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則血腥墓穴須橫置進戰場。

original_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

flavor: When the Planeswalker Angrath called dinosaurs "dragons," the name stuck in certain pirate circles.

foreign_names.flavor: Als der Planeswalker Angrath anfing, die Dinosaurier als „Drachen" zu bezeichnen, blieb dieser Name bei vielen Piraten hängen.
foreign_names.name: Drachenschädel-Pass
foreign_names.text:
Der Drachenschädel-Pass kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst einen Sumpf oder ein Gebirge.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {B} oder {R}.

foreign_names.flavor: Cuando el Planeswalker Angrath llamó a los dinosaurios "dragones", el nombre se quedó en ciertos círculos de piratas.
foreign_names.name: Cumbre Cráneo de Dragón
foreign_names.text:
La Cumbre Cráneo de Dragón entra al campo de batalla girada a menos que controles un Pantano o una Montaña.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {R} a tu reserva de maná.

foreign_names.flavor: Lorsque le Planeswalker Angrath appela les dinosaures des « dragons », le nom s'ancra dans certains cercles pirates.
foreign_names.name: Sommet du Crânedragon
foreign_names.text:
Le Sommet du Crânedragon arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous ne contrôliez un marais ou une montagne.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R} à votre réserve.

foreign_names.flavor: Quando il Planeswalker Angrath chiamò i dinosauri "draghi", il nome prese piede in alcuni gruppi pirateschi.
foreign_names.name: Vetta del Teschio di Drago
foreign_names.text:
La Vetta del Teschio di Drago entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli una Palude o una Montagna.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreign_names.flavor: プレインズウォーカーであるアングラスが恐竜のことを「ドラゴン」と呼んだとき、それは一部の海賊たちに大受けした。
foreign_names.name: 竜髑髏の山頂
foreign_names.text:
あなたが沼か山をコントロールしていないかぎり、竜髑髏の山頂はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{B}か{R}を加える。

foreign_names.flavor: 플레인즈워커 앙그라스가 공룡을 "용"이라고 불렀을 때, 그 이름이 특정 해적단 사이에 굳어졌다.
foreign_names.name: 용두개골 봉우리
foreign_names.text:
용두개골 봉우리는 당신이 늪이나 산을 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {B} 또는 {R}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Quando o planeswalker Angrath chamou os dinossauros de "dragões", o nome pegou em certos círculos da pirataria.
foreign_names.name: Pico da Caveira de Dragão
foreign_names.text:
Pico da Caveira de Dragão entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle um Pântano ou uma Montanha.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {R} à sua reserva de mana.

foreign_names.flavor: Когда Анграт назвал динозавров драконами, кое-кто из пиратов подхватил это слово, и название прижилось.
foreign_names.name: Пик Драконьего Черепа
foreign_names.text:
Пик Драконьего Черепа выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если только под вашим контролем нет Болота или Горы.
{T}: добавьте {B} или {R} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreign_names.flavor: 自从鹏洛客安戈斯把恐龙称为「龙」之后，这种称呼便在海盗圈子中流传了下来。
foreign_names.name: 龙颅山峰
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控沼泽或山脉，否则龙颅山峰须横置进战场。
{T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。

foreign_names.flavor: 自從鵬洛客安戈斯把恐龍稱為「龍」之後，這種稱呼便在海盜圈子中流傳了下來。
foreign_names.name: 龍顱山峰
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控沼澤或山脈，否則龍顱山峰須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{B}或{R}到你的魔法力池中。

name: Dragonskull Summit
original_text:
Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: This checks for lands you control with the land type Swamp or Mountain, not for lands named Swamp or Mountain. The lands it checks for don’t have to be basic lands. For example, if you control Stomping Ground (a nonbasic land with the land types Mountain and Forest), Dragonskull Summit will enter the battlefield untapped.
As this is entering the battlefield, it checks for lands that are already on the battlefield. It won’t see lands that are entering the battlefield at the same time (due to Warp World, for example).

text:
Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

flavor:
"You will not be trained here. You will be forged."
—Commander Yaszen

foreign_names.flavor:
„Du wirst hier nicht ausgebildet, sondern geschmiedet."
—Kommandeur Yaszen
foreign_names.name: Heilige Schmelze
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {W}.)
Sowie die Heilige Schmelze ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt sie getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Aquí no entrenarás. Te forjarás".
—Comandante Yaszen
foreign_names.name: Fundición sagrada
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Agrega {R} o {W}.)
En cuanto la Fundición sagrada entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girada.

foreign_names.flavor:
« Ici, vous ne serez pas entraînés. Vous serez forgés. »
—Commandant Yaszen
foreign_names.name: Fonderie sacrée
foreign_names.text:

Au moment où la Fonderie sacrée arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, elle arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Qui non sarete addestrati: sarete forgiati."
—Comandante Yaszen
foreign_names.name: Fonderia Sacra
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {R} o {W}.)
Mentre la Fonderia Sacra entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.

foreign_names.flavor:
「お前はここで訓練されるのではない。叩き上げられるのだ。」
――司令官ヤーゼン
foreign_names.name: 聖なる鋳造所
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{R}か{W}を加える。）
聖なる鋳造所が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor:
"너는 이곳에서 훈련받는 것이 아니다. 제련되는 것이다."
—사령관 야스젠
foreign_names.name: 신성한 주조소
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {R} 또는 {W}를 추가한다.)
신성한 주조소가 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 신성한 주조소는 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor:
"Aqui vocês não serão treinados. Serão forjados."
— Comandante Yaszen
foreign_names.name: Fundição Sagrada
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Adicione {R} ou {W}.)
Conforme Fundição Sagrada entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ela entrará no campo de batalha virada.

foreign_names.flavor:
«Тебя не будут здесь учить. Тебя здесь выкуют».
— Командующий Язен
foreign_names.name: Священная Кузня
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {R} или {W}.)
При выходе Священной Кузни на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, она выходит на поле битвы повернутой.

foreign_names.flavor:
「在此处你不仅将受到严格训练，更将经受千锤百炼。」
～指挥官叶程
foreign_names.name: 圣洁锻炉
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{R}或{W}。）
于圣洁锻炉进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则圣洁锻炉须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor:
「在此處你不僅將受到嚴格訓練，更將經受千錘百煉。」
～指揮官葉程
foreign_names.name: 聖潔鍛爐
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{R}或{W}。）
於聖潔鍛爐進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則聖潔鍛爐須橫置進戰場。

name: Sacred Foundry
original_text: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

flavor: The sunlight falls pristine on the temple at Epityr, softened by the remembered shadows of angelic saviors' wings.

foreign_names.flavor: Sanft fällt das Licht auf den Tempel von Epityr und lässt die in Stein gemeißelten Flügel der Engelsretterin schimmern.
foreign_names.name: Felskuppenzuflucht
foreign_names.text:
Die Felskuppenzuflucht kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst ein Gebirge oder eine Ebene.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {W}.

foreign_names.flavor: La luz del sol cae inmaculada sobre el templo de Épityr, solo suavizada por las sombras recordadas de las alas de los salvadores angelicales.
foreign_names.name: Refugio en la cima
foreign_names.text:
El Refugio en la cima entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles una Montaña o una Llanura.
{T}: Agrega {R} o {W}.

foreign_names.flavor: La lumière cristalline du soleil inonde le temple d'Epityr, adoucie par l'ombre indélébile des ailes angéliques salvatrices.
foreign_names.name: Rectorat du haut des falaises
foreign_names.text:
Le Rectorat du haut des falaises arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous ne contrôliez une montagne ou une plaine.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {W}.

foreign_names.flavor: I raggi del sole splendono immacolati sul tempio di Epityr, soffusi dal ricordo delle ombre proiettate dalle ali di angeli salvifici.
foreign_names.name: Rifugio in Cima al Dirupo
foreign_names.text:
Il Rifugio in Cima al Dirupo entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non controlli una Montagna o una Pianura.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o {W}.

foreign_names.flavor: エピティアの寺院を照らす純粋な陽光は、救世天使の翼が作る影の記憶で弱まっている。
foreign_names.name: 断崖の避難所
foreign_names.text:
断崖の避難所は、あなたが山か平地をコントロールしていないかぎり、タップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{R}か{W}を加える。

foreign_names.flavor: 청명한 햇빛이 에피티르의 사원을 비추고, 천사같은 구원자의 날개가 드리운 기억 속 그림자가 이곳을 부드럽게 한다.
foreign_names.name: 절벽 위의 은거처
foreign_names.text:
절벽 위의 은거처는 당신이 산이나 들을 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {R} 또는 {W}를 추가한다.

foreign_names.flavor: A luz do sol incide límpida no templo em Epityr, suavizada pelas sombras que lembram as asas das salvadoras angélicas.
foreign_names.name: Retiro da Falésia
foreign_names.text:
Retiro da Falésia entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle uma Montanha ou uma Planície.
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {W}.

foreign_names.flavor: Чистый, нетронутый солнечный свет падает на храм в Эпитире. Он помнит тени крыльев ангельских спасителей — и становится мягче.
foreign_names.name: Убежище на Утесе
foreign_names.text:
Убежище на Утесе выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если под вашим контролем нет Горы или Равнины.
{T}: добавьте {R} или {W}.

foreign_names.flavor: 纯洁阳光洒落艾比提殿堂，穿过为人追忆的救世天使双翼而更加柔和。
foreign_names.name: 崖顶修行所
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控山脉或平原，否则崖顶修行所须横置进战场。
{T}：加{R}或{W}。

foreign_names.flavor: 純潔陽光灑落艾比提殿堂，穿過為人追憶的救世天使雙翼而更加柔和。
foreign_names.name: 崖頂修行所
foreign_names.text:
除非你操控山脈或平原，否則崖頂修行所須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{R}或{W}。

name: Clifftop Retreat
original_text:
Clifftop Retreat enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
text:
Clifftop Retreat enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

foreign_names.name: Gott-Verewigte Oketra
foreign_names.text:
Doppelschlag
Immer wenn du einen Kreaturenzauber wirkst, erzeuge einen 4/4 schwarzen Zombie-Kreaturenspielstein mit Wachsamkeit.
Wenn die Gott-Verewigte Oketra stirbt oder aus dem Spiel ins Exil geschickt wird, kannst du sie als dritte Karte von oben in die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers legen.

foreign_names.name: Oketra, diosa eterna
foreign_names.text:
Daña dos veces.
Siempre que lances un hechizo de criatura, crea una ficha de criatura Guerrero Zombie negra 4/4 con la habilidad de vigilancia.
Cuando Oketra, diosa eterna muera o vaya al exilio desde el campo de batalla, puedes ponerla en la biblioteca de su propietario en tercer lugar desde la parte superior.

foreign_names.name: Oketra l'Éternelle-déesse
foreign_names.text:
Double initiative
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort de créature, créez un jeton de créature 4/4 noire Zombie et Guerrier avec la vigilance.
Quand Oketra l'Éternelle-déesse meurt ou est mise en exil depuis le champ de bataille, vous pouvez la mettre dans la bibliothèque de son propriétaire en troisième position à partir du dessus.

foreign_names.name: Oketra, Dea Eterna
foreign_names.text:
Doppio attacco
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia creatura, crea una pedina creatura Guerriero Zombie 4/4 nera con cautela.
Quando Oketra, Dea Eterna muore o viene messa in esilio dal campo di battaglia, puoi metterla nel grimorio del suo proprietario come terza carta.

foreign_names.name: 永遠神オケチラ
foreign_names.text:
二段攻撃
あなたがクリーチャー・呪文を唱えるたび、警戒を持つ黒の４/４のゾンビ・戦士・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
永遠神オケチラが死亡するか戦場から追放領域に置かれたとき、あなたはこれをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上から３枚目に置いてもよい。

foreign_names.name: 신 영생자 오케트라
foreign_names.text:
이단공격
당신이 생물 주문을 발동할 때마다, 경계를 가진 4/4 흑색 좀비 전사 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
신 영생자 오케트라가 죽거나 전장에서 추방 영역에 놓일 때, 당신은 신 영생자 오케트라를 소유자의 서고 맨 위에서 세 번째에 놓을 수 있다.

foreign_names.name: Eterna-deusa Oketra
foreign_names.text:
Golpe duplo
Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica de criatura, crie uma ficha de criatura preta 4/4 do tipo Zumbi Guerreiro com vigilância.
Quando Eterna-deusa Oketra morre ou é colocada no exílio vinda do campo de batalha, você pode colocá-la no topo do grimório de seu dono na terceira posição.

foreign_names.name: Вековечная Богиня Окетра
foreign_names.text:
Двойной удар
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание существа, создайте одну фишку существа 4/4 черный Зомби Воин с Бдительностью.
Когда Вековечная Богиня Окетра умирает или попадает в изгнание с поля битвы, вы можете положить ее в библиотеку ее владельца третьей сверху.

foreign_names.name: 永生煞神欧柯塔
foreign_names.text:
连击
每当你施放生物咒语时，派出一个4/4黑色，具警戒异能的灵俑／战士衍生生物。
当永生煞神欧柯塔死去或从战场进入放逐区时，你可以将它置于其拥有者牌库顶数来第三张的位置。

foreign_names.name: 永生煞神歐柯塔
foreign_names.text:
連擊
每當你施放生物咒語時，派出一個4/4黑色，具警戒異能的殭屍／戰士衍生生物。
當永生煞神歐柯塔死去或從戰場進入放逐區時，你可以將它置於其擁有者牌庫頂數來第三張的位置。

name: God-Eternal Oketra
original_text:
Double strike
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 4/4 black Zombie Warrior creature token with vigilance.
When God-Eternal Oketra dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

rulings.text: Oketra’s first triggered ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

In the Commander format, a commander’s color identity isn’t affected by color words (such as black) appearing in its text. If God-Eternal Oketra is your commander, your deck can’t contain black mana symbols.
If one of these Gods leaves the graveyard or exile while its last ability is on the stack, it will remain in its new zone, even if that zone is a graveyard or exile.
If the God’s owner has two or fewer cards in their library, the God is put on the bottom of their library as its last ability resolves.
If you control another player’s God when it dies, you decide whether to put that card into its owner’s library.

If an effect exiles the God and immediately returns it to the battlefield, its last ability triggers but will have no effect. However, if an effect exiles it and would return it to the battlefield at a later time, the God’s ability may return that card its owner’s library first. If it does, the effect that exiled it won’t return it later.

In a multiplayer game, if you put another player’s God onto the battlefield under your control, it will be exiled as you leave the game. If you were still the controller of that God, you would control its triggered ability but you have left the game; that ability won’t resolve and the card remains in exile. Similarly, if you lose the game at the same time that another player’s God that you put onto the battlefield is destroyed, it remains in its owner’s graveyard.

If one of these Gods would die and it’s your commander in the Commander variant, you may put it into the command zone instead. If you save your commander this way, it doesn’t die and you won’t put it into your library. The same is true if it would be exiled.

text:
Double strike
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 4/4 black Zombie Warrior creature token with vigilance.
When God-Eternal Oketra dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

foreign_names.name: Gott-Verewigte Bontu
foreign_names.text:
Bedrohlich
Wenn die Gott-Verewigte Bontu ins Spiel kommt, opfere eine beliebige Anzahl anderer bleibender Karten und ziehe dann entsprechend viele Karten.
Wenn die Gott-Verewigte Bontu stirbt oder aus dem Spiel ins Exil geschickt wird, kannst du sie als dritte Karte von oben in die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers legen.

foreign_names.name: Bontu, diosa eterna
foreign_names.text:
Amenaza.
Cuando Bontu, diosa eterna entre al campo de batalla, sacrifica cualquier cantidad de otros permanentes, luego roba esa misma cantidad de cartas.
Cuando Bontu, diosa eterna muera o vaya al exilio desde el campo de batalla, puedes ponerla en la biblioteca de su propietario en tercer lugar desde la parte superior.

foreign_names.name: Bontu l'Éternelle-déesse
foreign_names.text:
Menace
Quand Bontu l'Éternelle-déesse arrive sur le champ de bataille, sacrifiez n'importe quel nombre d'autres permanents, puis piochez autant de cartes.
Quand Bontu l'Éternelle-déesse meurt ou est mise en exil depuis le champ de bataille, vous pouvez la mettre dans la bibliothèque de son propriétaire en troisième position à partir du dessus.

foreign_names.name: Bontu, Dea Eterna
foreign_names.text:
Minacciare
Quando Bontu, Dea Eterna entra nel campo di battaglia, sacrifica un qualsiasi numero di altri permanenti, poi pesca altrettante carte.
Quando Bontu, Dea Eterna muore o viene messa in esilio dal campo di battaglia, puoi metterla nel grimorio del suo proprietario come terza carta.

foreign_names.name: 永遠神バントゥ
foreign_names.text:
威迫
永遠神バントゥが戦場に出たとき、他の望む数のパーマネントを生け贄に捧げ、その後それに等しい枚数のカードを引く。
永遠神バントゥが死亡するか戦場から追放領域に置かれたとき、あなたはこれをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上から３枚目に置いてもよい。

foreign_names.name: 신 영생자 본투
foreign_names.text:
호전적
신 영생자 본투가 전장에 들어올 때, 다른 지속물을 원하는 수만큼 희생한 후, 그만큼 카드를 뽑는다.
신 영생자 본투가 죽거나 전장에서 추방 영역에 놓일 때, 당신은 신 영생자 본투를 소유자의 서고 맨 위에서 세 번째에 놓을 수 있다.

foreign_names.name: Eterna-deusa Bontu
foreign_names.text:
Ameaçar
Quando Eterna-deusa Bontu entrar no campo de batalha, sacrifique qualquer número de outras permanentes e depois compre aquela quantidade de cards.
Quando Eterna-deusa Bontu morre ou é colocada no exílio vinda do campo de batalha, você pode colocá-la no topo do grimório de seu dono na terceira posição.

foreign_names.name: Вековечная Богиня Бонту
foreign_names.text:
Угроза
Когда Вековечная Богиня Бонту выходит на поле битвы, пожертвуйте любое количество других перманентов, затем возьмите столько же карт.
Когда Вековечная Богиня Бонту умирает или попадает в изгнание с поля битвы, вы можете положить ее в библиотеку ее владельца третьей сверху.

foreign_names.name: 永生煞神芭图
foreign_names.text:
威慑
当永生煞神芭图进战场时，牺牲任意数量的其他永久物，然后抓等量的牌。
当永生煞神芭图死去或从战场进入放逐区时，你可以将它置于其拥有者牌库顶数来第三张的位置。

foreign_names.name: 永生煞神芭圖
foreign_names.text:
威懾
當永生煞神芭圖進戰場時，犧牲任意數量的其他永久物，然後抽等量的牌。
當永生煞神芭圖死去或從戰場進入放逐區時，你可以將它置於其擁有者牌庫頂數來第三張的位置。

name: God-Eternal Bontu
original_text:
Menace
When God-Eternal Bontu enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of other permanents, then draw that many cards.
When God-Eternal Bontu dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

rulings.text: As Bontu’s first triggered ability resolves, you may choose to sacrifice zero other permanents.
If any abilities trigger as you sacrifice other permanents, those abilities won’t be put onto the stack until after you’ve drawn cards.
If a second God-Eternal Bontu enters the battlefield under your control, you’ll put one into your graveyard before you can sacrifice anything to the new Bontu’s triggered ability.
If one of these Gods leaves the graveyard or exile while its last ability is on the stack, it will remain in its new zone, even if that zone is a graveyard or exile.
If the God’s owner has two or fewer cards in their library, the God is put on the bottom of their library as its last ability resolves.
If you control another player’s God when it dies, you decide whether to put that card into its owner’s library.

If an effect exiles the God and immediately returns it to the battlefield, its last ability triggers but will have no effect. However, if an effect exiles it and would return it to the battlefield at a later time, the God’s ability may return that card its owner’s library first. If it does, the effect that exiled it won’t return it later.

In a multiplayer game, if you put another player’s God onto the battlefield under your control, it will be exiled as you leave the game. If you were still the controller of that God, you would control its triggered ability but you have left the game; that ability won’t resolve and the card remains in exile. Similarly, if you lose the game at the same time that another player’s God that you put onto the battlefield is destroyed, it remains in its owner’s graveyard.

If one of these Gods would die and it’s your commander in the Commander variant, you may put it into the command zone instead. If you save your commander this way, it doesn’t die and you won’t put it into your library. The same is true if it would be exiled.

text:
Menace
When God-Eternal Bontu enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of other permanents, then draw that many cards.
When God-Eternal Bontu dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

flavor: The Orzhov are not the only religious tradition on Ravnica, nor the oldest.

foreign_names.flavor: Die Orzhov sind weder die einzige noch die älteste religiöse Tradition in Ravnica.
foreign_names.name: Priesterin der vergessenen Götter
foreign_names.text: {T}, opfere zwei andere Kreaturen: Eine beliebige Anzahl an Spielern deiner Wahl verliert jeweils 2 Lebenspunkte und opfert eine Kreatur. Du erzeugst {B}{B} und ziehst eine Karte.

foreign_names.flavor: Los orzhov no son la única tradición religiosa en Rávnica, ni la más antigua.
foreign_names.name: Sacerdotisa de dioses olvidados
foreign_names.text: {T}, sacrificar otras dos criaturas: Cualquier cantidad de jugadores objetivo pierden 2 vidas y sacrifican una criatura cada uno. Agregas {B}{B} y robas una carta.

foreign_names.flavor: Orzhov n'est pas la seule tradition religieuse sur Ravnica, ni la plus ancienne.
foreign_names.name: Prêtresse des dieux oubliés
foreign_names.text: {T}, sacrifiez deux autres créatures : N'importe quel nombre de joueurs ciblés perdent chacun 2 points de vie et sacrifient une créature. Vous ajoutez {B}{B} et piochez une carte.

foreign_names.flavor: Il credo degli Orzhov non è l'unica tradizione religiosa di Ravnica, né la più antica.
foreign_names.name: Sacerdotessa degli Dei Dimenticati
foreign_names.text: {T}, Sacrifica altre due creature: Scegli un qualsiasi numero di giocatori bersaglio. Ognuno di essi perde 2 punti vita e sacrifica una creatura. Aggiungi {B}{B} e pesca una carta.

foreign_names.flavor: ラヴニカにおいて、オルゾフのみが信仰深い一派というわけでも、最古というわけでもない。
foreign_names.name: 忘れられた神々の僧侶
foreign_names.text: {T}, 他のクリーチャー２体を生け贄に捧げる：望む数のプレイヤーを対象とする。それらのプレイヤーはそれぞれ、２点のライフを失いクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。あなたは{B}{B}を加えカードを１枚引く。

foreign_names.flavor: 오르조브는 라브니카의 유일한 종교도, 가장 오래된 종교도 아니다.
foreign_names.name: 잊혀진 신들의 사제
foreign_names.text: {T}, 다른 생물 두 개를 희생한다: 플레이어를 원하는 수만큼 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어들은 각각 생명 2점을 잃고 생물 한 개를 희생한다. 당신은 {B}{B}를 추가하고 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Os Orzhov não são a única tradição religiosa em Ravnica, nem a mais antiga.
foreign_names.name: Sacerdotisa dos Deuses Esquecidos
foreign_names.text: {T}, sacrifique duas outras criaturas: Qualquer número de jogadores alvo perde, cada um, 2 pontos de vida e sacrifica, cada um, uma criatura. Você adiciona {B}{B} e compra um card.

foreign_names.flavor: Орзовы — не единственная религиозная традиция в Равнике и не старейшая.
foreign_names.name: Жрица Забытых Богов

name: Priest of Forgotten Gods
original_text: {T}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Any number of target players each lose 2 life and sacrifice a creature. You add {B}{B} and draw a card.

rulings.text: You can activate the ability of Priest of Forgotten Gods without choosing any targets if you wish. You’ll still add {B}{B} and draw a card.
You may target players who can’t sacrifice a creature. Those players still lose 2 life.
Because it may have targets, the ability of Priest of Forgotten Gods isn’t a mana ability. It uses the stack and can be responded to, even if no targets were chosen.
